title._content: Live here at low rent - Lakeview Terrace, 1340 West 28th St. at Main Avenue bridge (LOC)

description._content: Clough, Stanley Thomas,, 1905-, artist. Live here at low rent - Lakeview Terrace, 1340 West 28th St. at Main Avenue bridge [Ohio : Federal Art Project, between 1936 and 1940] 1 print on board (poster) : silkscreen, color. Notes: Date stamped on verso: Nov 1 1940. Work Projects Administration Poster Collection (Library of Congress). Poster for Cleveland Metropolitan Housing Authority promoting low income housing. Subjects: Housing--Ohio--Cleveland--1930-1940. Format: Posters--1930-1940. Screen prints--Color--1930-1940. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print More information about the WPA Posters is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.wpapos Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/cph.3b48920 Call Number: POS - WPA - OH .C56, no. 4
